skills.name: BESET
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Remove a Beneficial Effect each hit.
• Lower ATK and MAGIC of the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: SET ABLAZE
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Inflict 3 Physical Burn and Flame effects on enemies for 2 turns.
• 50% Chance to inflict Permadeath on each enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: AUTOMATA
desc: Remove Immunity and Perfect Immunity from up to 2 enemies every turn.
